comments.body:
The test server is failing to start with the error:

`AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'create_default_context'`

On Ubuntu 14.04 we only have Python 2.7.6, but `create_default_context` was added in Python 2.7.9:

https://docs.python.org/2/library/ssl.html#ssl.create_default_context
Thanks, I opted to make smtpserver.py aware of this instead. So that it would at least work without TLS.
